sentence.Network_en: There was always an undercurrent of greediness, a hankering, and sense of waste.
sentence.Network_cn: 总是存在着一种贪得无厌的暗流, 一种非分之想, 一种蹉跎的感觉.

sentence.Network_en: A few words successfully bring out the greediness of the usurer.
sentence.Network_cn: 寥寥数笔,就把这高利贷者贪婪的嘴脸勾画出来了.

sentence.Network_en: His greediness for material comforts will one day bring him to justice.
sentence.Network_cn: 他如此贪贿无厌,终会受到法律制裁的.
